data: The little city of Devondale, Ohio, had shaken off for one night at least the air of aristocratic calm that normally distinguished it from the busy mill towns on its right and left.
Jordan, Elizabeth Garver, 1867-1947; Meylan, Paul Julian, 1882-1961 [Illustrator]
